basic_info.description: I'm Jared Berkowitz, a student and web developer looking to start a career in IT. I'm working with front-end frameworks like Bootstrap and React.js to create this site. If you feel inclined, please use the contact page to message me and it will be sent directly to my personal email address.

projects.title: PanOpticon
projects.description: Created in a 3 month period using C# ASP.NET, Bootstrap, SQL Server and a lot of coffee, PanOpticon is a productivity tool meant to give the user a wide range of features for productivity in a single website. The primary feeature was a calendar system with user-specific tasks, notes, and to-do lists, as well as more general news and weather feeds.
